mapper.select: select m.* from (tpm_member)m, (select member_idx from tpm_project_member where project_idx=#{project_idx})pm where m.member_idx =pm.member_idx
select * from tpm_member where member_idx in(select member_idx from tpm_work_member where work_idx=#{work_idx})

SELECT p.*, cwck.category_idx, cwck.category_name, cwck.work_idx, cwck.work_title, cwck.work_start, cwck.work_end, cwck.work_complete, cwck.work_confirm, cwck.work_state, cwck.checklist_idx, cwck.checklist_content, cwck.checklist_state FROM tpm_project p, (SELECT c.project_idx, c.category_idx, c.category_name, wck.work_idx, wck.work_title, wck.work_start, wck.work_end, wck.work_complete, wck.work_confirm, wck.work_state, wck.checklist_idx, wck.checklist_content, wck.checklist_state FROM tpm_category c, (SELECT w.category_idx, w.work_idx, w.work_title, w.work_start, w.work_end, w.work_complete, w.work_confirm, w.work_state, ck.checklist_idx, ck.checklist_content, ck.checklist_state FROM tpm_work w LEFT OUTER JOIN tpm_checklist ck ON w.work_idx = ck.work_idx WHERE w.work_idx IN (SELECT work_idx FROM tpm_work_member WHERE member_idx = #{member_idx})) wck WHERE c.category_idx = wck.category_idx) cwck WHERE p.project_idx = cwck.project_idx ORDER BY cwck.work_idx DESC, cwck.checklist_idx ASC
